trans-unit.source: Represents request objects submitted as a batch to [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta oggetti richiesta inviati come batch [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In a group of queries submitted as a batch to the data service, the queries are specified as DataServiceRequest instances.
trans-unit.target: In un gruppo di query inviato come batch al servizio dati, le query vengono specificate come istanze DataServiceRequest.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> is returned that represents the response of the batch request as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>viene restituito, che rappresenta la risposta della richiesta batch nel suo complesso.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>

trans-unit.source: Individual query responses are represented as <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.QueryOperationResponse> objects, derived from <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse>, that are accessible by enumerating the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> instance.
trans-unit.target: Risposte alle singole query vengono rappresentate come <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.QueryOperationResponse>oggetti, derivati da <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse>, che sono accessibili mediante l'enumerazione di <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>istanza.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.QueryOperationResponse>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of object submitted as a batch to the data service.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di oggetto inviato come batch al servizio dati.

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI of the request object submitted to a data service.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'URI dell'oggetto della richiesta inviata a un servizio dati.

trans-unit.source: Represents the URI of the query to the data service.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta l'URI della query al servizio dati.

trans-unit.source: The requested URI as a <xref:System.String> value.
